backend/main.mo: Implements a change‑request system with access‑controlled submission, admin review, and storage in a Nat‑keyed map.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata listing footer‑related modifications, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing layout, sections, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app with metadata for the AirHealth site.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing header, footer, credit label, and all content sections including projects and change requests.
frontend/src/components/aqi/AQIGuide.tsx: Interactive tabbed AQI guide showing category info, risks, and actions with educational alerts.
frontend/src/components/diseases/Conditi: Reusable card rendering a health condition’s icon, description, symptoms, and protective steps.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, smooth‑scroll quick links, medical notice, and copyright year without the Caffeine AI attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with desktop and mobile navigation that scrolls to sections smoothly.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopRightC: Displays a fixed bottom-left credit label with the creator's name.
frontend/src/components/sections/AQICate: Section introducing AQI categories and displaying the AQIGuide component.
frontend/src/components/sections/Disease: Explains health impacts of air pollution, shows a disclaimer, and lists condition cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with introductory text, CTA buttons, and a large image that scrolls to key sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Prevent: Provides prevention and protection tips in card format covering indoor, outdoor, and mask-related guidance.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Shows filterable project cards for bike and car pollution‑reduction technologies.
frontend/src/components/sections/Request: Authenticated form allowing users to submit change requests with optional metadata.
frontend/src/components/sections/Symptom: Outlines emergency symptoms, mild symptoms, and guidance on when to seek medical help.
frontend/src/components/sections/Vulnera: Renders a section describing vulnerable groups affected by air pollution with cards for each group and protective guidance.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIsA: Displays an overview of the Air Quality Index, including what it measures, why it matters, pollution sources, and scale details.
frontend/src/content/aqiCategories.ts: Defines AQI category data with ranges, colors, descriptions, health risks, and recommended actions.
frontend/src/content/conditions.ts: Provides structured health condition data linking diseases to pollution impacts, symptoms, and protective steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, status tracking, and auth client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future query hooks; currently empty as backend has no methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitChangeReques: Defines a mutation for submitting change requests through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base typography and layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors mapped to CSS variables, extended typography, containers, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, indicating the active request to remove the Caffeine AI attribution watermark and related cleanup.
